summary: This document is a series of internal email/text messages from July 27, 2019, concerning the status of inmate Jeffrey Epstein. It includes an observation from a staff member who saw Epstein before his legal visit, noting his complaints about dehydration, limited bathroom breaks during long attorney meetings, anxiety about returning to the SHU, and inability to sleep due to noise. The document also contains a suicide watch and psych observation update stating 'None' for that date.

events.title: Epstein's Legal Visit and Status Observation
events.description: A staff member observes inmate Jeffrey Epstein before his legal visit. Epstein complains about being dehydrated due to limited bathroom breaks during his approximately 12-hour attorney meetings, anxiety about returning to the SHU, and inability to sleep there due to noise at night.

events.title: Suicide Watch and Psych Observation Update
events.description: An update is recorded indicating 'None' for Suicide Watch and a psych observation is noted for Epstein (Inmate #76318-054) on this date.

keyFacts: On July 27, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein was observed by staff and was reportedly stable before a legal visit.
Epstein complained of dehydration, stating he could not drink enough water due to limited bathroom breaks during his approximately 12-hour attorney visits.
Epstein expressed anxiety about returning to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and an inability to sleep there due to noise like banging and screaming at night.
A suicide watch and psych observation update for July 27, 2019, recorded 'None' for suicide watch for Epstein.
